data.text: @PendragonSouled @libsoftiktok You forgot your pronouns in your bio.

@Jadey08464860 @montyfisto @PendragonSouled @libsoftiktok I don’t know your occupation but I don’t think a healthy work environment is one where everyone is trying to get people they disagree with caught on tape saying objectionable things.

@Jadey08464860 @montyfisto @PendragonSouled @libsoftiktok Why not confront them, tell them their opinion is disrespectful and to have conversation elsewhere? Again I think it’s horrible what she said, but this doesn’t justify trying to manipulate them or using social media to scare them into thinking they are always being recorded.

@Jadey08464860 @montyfisto @PendragonSouled @libsoftiktok Recording someone’s conversation w/o then knowing, outside of getting them in admitting a crime is not cool. No matter school not. It’s a form of thought control.
@Know_4yourself @montyfisto @PendragonSouled @libsoftiktok Yeah it’s in school and it’s not shady when a teacher is talking so loud you can film the convo from far away
@libsoftiktok Oh I'm sure she'll be back
